questionsList.text: Drank a can, bottle, or glass of a sports drink two or more times per day(not counting low calorie sports drinks during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Drank a can, bottle, or glass of a sports drink three or more times per day
questionsList.text: Drank a can, bottle, or glass of a sports drink three or more times per day(not counting low calorie sports drinks during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Did not drink a can, bottle, or glass of a sports drink
questionsList.text: Did not drink a can, bottle, or glass of a sports drink(not counting low calorie sports drinks during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Had a sunburn
questionsList.text: Had a sunburn(one or more times during the 12 months before the survey, counting even a small part of the skin turning red or hurting for 12 hours or more after being outside in the sun or after using a sunlamp or other indoor tanning device)

questionsList.key: Currently smoked cigarettes or cigars
questionsList.text: Currently smoked cigarettes or cigars(on at least 1 day during the 30 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Currently used cigarettes, cigars, or smokeless tobacco
questionsList.text: Currently used cigarettes, cigars, or smokeless tobacco(on at least 1 day during the 30 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Currently used tobacco
questionsList.text: Currently used tobacco(current cigarette, smokeless tobacco, cigar, or electronic vapor products use on at least 1 day during the 30 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Did not eat vegetables
questionsList.text: Did not eat vegetables(green salad, potatoes (excluding French fries, fried potatoes, or potato chips), carrots, or other vegetables, during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Ate vegetables one or more times per day
questionsList.text: Ate vegetables one or more times per day(green salad, potatoes (excluding French fries, fried potatoes, or potato chips), carrots, or other vegetables, during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Ate vegetables two or more times per day
questionsList.text: Ate vegetables two or more times per day(green salad, potatoes (excluding French fries, fried potatoes, or potato chips), carrots, or other vegetables, during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Ate vegetables three or more times per day
questionsList.text: Ate vegetables three or more times per day(green salad, potatoes (excluding French fries, fried potatoes, or potato chips), carrots, or other vegetables, during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Did not drink a bottle or glass of plain water
questionsList.text: Did not drink a bottle or glass of plain water(during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Drank one or more glasses per day of water
questionsList.text: Drank one or more glasses per day of water(during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Drank two or more glasses per day of water
questionsList.text: Drank two or more glasses per day of water(during the 7 days before the survey)

questionsList.key: Drank three or more glasses per day of water
questionsList.text: Drank three or more glasses per day of water(during the 7 days before the survey)
